title: Accelerated Cellular Senescence in Progressive Multiple Sclerosis: A Histopathological Study
details: D Papadopoulos, R Magliozzi, S Bandiera, I Cimignolo… - Annals of Neurology, 2025
abstract: Objective The neurodegenerative processes driving the build‐up of disability in progressive multiple sclerosis (P‐MS) have not been fully elucidated. Recent data link cellular senescence (CS) to neurodegeneration. We investigated for evidence of …
